div.p: I recieved two letters from you yesterday and I cant tell you how glad I was to get them I was looking every day for a letter from you So you can imagine how glad I was. I was cooking dinner when the mail came and when I got the two letters I quit frying stake to read them. The other cook said he didnt want me to get any more mail when we were cooking dinner But I hope I can get it any time believe me welll things are a little quiet here now as I am getting use to the noise and things that go on here

When I first got here every time I heard an aeroplane I would have to go out and look at it as long as I could see it and now I dont notice them half the time Unless I think there is going to be a fight in the air. I like to see that it is real entertaining
I think I told you about seeing the German plane come down in flames the other day Well that alway pleases me to see the WORD Backs come down.

But things are coming along nice now. We have some fun here with the boxing gloves the company shares them and in the evenings after supper some one put them on a go to it. We have some French soilders here and some times they put them on and then we have some fun Soilders are just like kids always playing but we have to do some thing like that to amuse our selfs.

Well I am sorry you didnt get to go to the dance. But I dont understand why you didnt tell Bob you wanted to go I remember very well how you use to tell me what to do and more especially to go home pretty early do you remember it. Well I guess Ester has to love Carl so

much she dont have time to write me. I think I will write them night . If I have the time to write to mother on sunday I can realize yet Ester is married. Miss Mary Ransom writes to us boys and send the interesting news out of the town of Jackson Since I see in there also that you have had several wedding back home.

You said you would stash you letter because some one else wanted to read it. Well I am th eonly one that has to read it and I dont get tired at all You dont know how much I enjoy I do enjoy getting letters from you But hope in the near future we wont have to write to each other I will be home to talk to you Must close for this time write me real soon and dont forget me
